subject: Web3
title: Drug Supply Chain Verification
description: A 60-second lesson on Drug Supply Chain Verification.

hook.text: Counterfeit drugs kill over a million people yearly. Blockchain can verify a pill's journey from factory to pharmacy.

buildup.text: The Drug Supply Chain Security Act requires drug tracking in the US. Blockchain offers a tamper-proof solution.

discovery.text: Each batch of medicine gets a digital record: manufacturer, distributor, temperature during shipping, and delivery.

twist.text: Pharmaceutical companies are slow to adopt. Legacy systems, regulatory hurdles, and costs delay implementation.

climax.text: The technology to verify every pill exists. Getting the global supply chain to adopt it is the real challenge.

punchline.text: Every pill could have a traceable history. The industry just needs to adopt it.

quiz.question: How can blockchain help fight counterfeit drugs?
options: By creating tamper-proof records tracking each batch from factory to pharmacy
